games.title: Flappy pig
games.description: Developed a Flappy Bird-style mobile game clone using Unity. Implemented core mechanics such as procedural obstacle generation, scoring system, and collision logic. Released on itch.io as a learning project to practice game loops and mobile-friendly UI.

games.title: Astaroth
games.description: Designed and developed a 2D action-platformer in Unity featuring real-time combat and passive abilities through collectible trinkets. Built a custom gravity system to achieve more cartoon-like, responsive movement. Implemented enemy AI, combo-based attacks, and level transitions. Focused on responsive controls and a modular character upgrade system.

games.title: A Game About Dragons
games.description: Developed during a two-week game jam alongside 2 artists, a narrative designer, and a sound designer. Served as the main programmer, implementing drag-and-drop mechanics, room transitions, and a room-based scene system to optimize performance. Worked with a multidisciplinary team using Git for version control and agile task management.
features: Git for version control and agile task management.

prototypes.title: Third Person Shooter Prototype
prototypes.description: A prototype of a third person shooter made with Unreal Engine 5 using C++ instead Blueprints.
features: Use of Line trace for detect shoots collisions
